com.echsylon.atlantis

Interface Atlantis.TokenHelper

  • Enclosing class:
    Atlantis

    public static interface Atlantis.TokenHelper
    This interface describes the token helper feature set. A token helpers main responsibility is to evaluate tokens and replace them with the corresponding evaluated values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MockResponse parse(MockRequest requestBeingMocked, MockResponse rawMockResponse)
      Performs the actual token replacement activities and delivers a new, ready-to-serve mock response.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        MockResponse parse(MockRequest requestBeingMocked,
                   MockResponse rawMockResponse)
        Performs the actual token replacement activities and delivers a new, ready-to-serve mock response.
        Parameters:
        requestBeingMocked - The request that is about to be served.
        rawMockResponse - The configured or recorded mock response (with the yet un-parsed tokens).
        Returns:
        A new, modified mock response that can be served to a waiting client. Note that MockResponse's are immutable from the users perspective. Implementing classes will have to create a new MockResponse instance to return, preferably by using a MockResponse.Builder instance.
